news.title: Europe weighs using trade 'bazooka' against the U.S. as Greenland crisis deepens
news.summary: European countries are reportedly considering retaliatory tariffs and wider economic counter-measures against the U.S. The European Union is expected to announce a new round of sanctions against the United States later this month.

news.title: Trump wants nations to pay $1 billion for permanent Board of Peace seats
news.summary: The Trump administration wants nations to pay $1 billion to remain on his Gaza peace board, reports show. The U.S. wants the nations to stay on the board until a peace deal is reached.

news.title: Putin invited to join Trump's 'Board of Peace,' Kremlin says
news.summary: The "Board of Peace" has been created by U.S. President Donald Trump to oversee the reconstruction of Gaza. The Board of Peace will be made up of representatives from Israel, the Palestinian Authority and the United Nations.

news.title: Greenland PM issues defiant rebuke over Trump's tariff threats: 'We will not be pressured'
news.summary: Greenland Prime Minister Jens-Frederik Nielsen says island will not be pressured over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff threats.

news.title: Gold and silver surge to fresh highs as investors digest Trump's push for Greenland and flock to safer assets
news.summary: U.S. gold and silver futures peaked on Monday as investors flock to safe-haven assets. Gold, silver prices hit record highs on Monday.

news.title: Is the stock market open on MLK Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
news.summary: The holiday commemorates the birth of civil rights leader Martin Luther King Jr. Today’s holiday marks the 50th anniversary of King's assassination.

news.title: As competition heats up, OpenAI changes course and introduces ads on ChatGPT
news.summary: Altman announced ads on ChatGPT. Confronted with fierce competition from its rivals and immense funding requirements in the next few years.

news.title: A year after his death, Gene Hackman’s longtime Santa Fe home is listed for $6.25 million
news.summary: Gene Hackman and his wife, Betsy Arakawa, were found dead inside the home last year. The actor's longtime New Mexico compound has hit the market.

news.title: Stock futures lead global markets sharply lower and gold hits fresh record as Trump threatens tariffs on Europe over Greenland
news.summary: Fears European nations will retaliate raises fears of more trade turmoil. Concerns European countries will retaliate raise fears of further turmoil. European nations may retaliate against U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum.

news.title: Trump plans 10% tariffs on European countries over Greenland: What it means for markets.
news.summary: Trump levels latest threat at Europe as Supreme Court decision on his tariffs loom. Supreme Court will rule on whether or not to uphold his tariffs.
